analysis.description:
TokenTimelock.constructor (/unique_chucks/11/0xdac3a0c0aebeeb13b6eeab7cf9fe951664c9fd7c.sol#650-661) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/11/0xdac3a0c0aebeeb13b6eeab7cf9fe951664c9fd7c.sol#658-659)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/11/0xdac3a0c0aebeeb13b6eeab7cf9fe951664c9fd7c.sol#687-703) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= _releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/11/0xdac3a0c0aebeeb13b6eeab7cf9fe951664c9fd7c.sol#692-695)
